column3: Traffic;Kambol: Video footage is circulating online after a Ford Ranger as hit by a train as it crossed the tracks. The incident occurred on the afternoon of June 19
column8: the car filming  had stopped for a train to pass
column9: when a silver Ford Ranger ‘Phnom Penh 2AC-2252’ did not stop and drove directly in front of the oncoming locamotive.------After around 100 meters
column10: the car crashed off the track with serious
column11: but luckily nobody was reported as injured
column12: especially as young children appeared to be inside.
